blog.name: tatertotbaddie
blog.description:
Hello I’m Jeremy(18) He/Him Gay

I’ll mostly post about Andi Mack (tyrus) stuff but once in a while I’ll post about Loona/ Steven universe

Changed my eevee avi

tags: sorry i havent been that active i have too much
summary: -One day Cyrus and Tj were taking a walk in the park when Cyrus triped and hurt his leg so Tj had to carry Cyrus bridal style...
body:
Tyrus headcanons

-One day Cyrus and Tj were taking a walk in the park when Cyrus triped and hurt his leg so Tj had to carry Cyrus bridal style all the way home

-Tj and Cyrus were walking home one day when it started raining out of nowhere but neither of them had umbrellas, so Tj decided to use his jacket to cover Cyrus so he wouldn’t get wet

-Cyrus was debating whether to kiss TJ first until he remembered what Tj told him “walk up to the muffin like you already own it… take the muffin” which gave him the courage to kiss Tj

-After their first kiss, Tj kept rolling on his bed all night because he couldn’t believe Cyrus kissed him and he was just so overwhelmed with joy

-When they move in together, Cyrus always ends up bringing random animals home and they always end up being more attached to Tj making Cyrus a bit jealous but Tj makes up for it by giving Cyrus lots of hugs and kisses

-Cyrus and Tj run a coffee shop called “The Rapping Muffin” on the bottom floor of their apartment

-this here is their logo that they came up with together

-also on Tuesday they have open mic days which Tj performs raps in and Cyrus supports him since he’s his #1 fan

tags: thank you so much @ x - deceased - x
summary: x -deceased- x  “[...] i used to ship jyrus, but only really because jonah was the only person to ship cyrus with at the time,...
body:
x -deceased- x  “[…] i used to ship jyrus, but only really because jonah was the only person to ship cyrus with at the time, you know? cyrus had a crush on jonah, jonah was really the only option for cyrus because he has little to no interactions with other boys on the show, and he verbally admitted to liking jonah.

but then, while on my laptop, i look over at my tv.. it’s the swing set scene, and i have never jumped ship faster. in that one little scene, i saw so much potential and chemistry between these two characters, more than i have ever seen between jonah and cyrus. as the show has gone on, i have seen how much more healthy and beneficial this relationship is than literally any other couple or ship on the show.


i don’t understand how people can’t see how much these two help each other. tj makes cyrus comfortable, he doesn’t look down at him, and instead gets visibly upset when people belittle cyrus. cyrus also makes tj comfortable, he makes tj want to be a better person. these two accept each other for who they are, while still helping each other grow as people - and honestly, that’s what a good relationship should be.

jyrus is a fine ship and all, i can see the appeal. but i don’t think it would be a healthy relationship for cyrus. jonah beck thinks cyrus is helpless, jonah beck is embarrassed to do silly things with cyrus. jonah beck treats cyrus the same way he treats everyone else. on the other hand, tj kippen thinks cyrus can do whatever he puts his mind to. tj kippen isn’t afraid to be seen doing silly things with cyrus. tj kippen thinks the world of cyrus. tj treats no one else the way he treats cyrus. those soft looks?  reserved for cyrus. those big smiles? reserved for cyrus. the only time we have seen tj be himself are his scenes with cyrus.

tj obviously has a lot to make up for. he definitely needs to apologize to buffy, and from then on he just needs to be nicer to people. however, i notice so many people in the fandom act like he needs to do so much more to prove that he’s changed (mainly jyrus shippers..) and no, he really doesn’t. tj’s storyline with buffy is almost over. all he needs to do is apologize and his arc with her is finished. people are so against tyrus that they convince themselves that tj is worse than he actually is. since becoming friends with cyrus, tj has treated people with so much more respect and kindness, he’s shown that he has become a better person.  in every scene together. that’s right, every goddamn scene, tj and cyrus have helped each other grow as people. literally all tj needs to do is apologize to buffy. that’s it. he doesn’t have to save all of china for him to be completely redeemed.

the fandom has forgiven amber, i haven’t seen anyone say anything about everything she’s done. amber, while she has shown that she is becoming nicer, has still barely been redeemed at all. what she did was way worse than what tj did to buffy. he just picked on her a little to try and get her to quit the basketball team, while amber straight up emotionally manipulated jonah. but i still see people acting like amber is a saint while tj is the embodiment of all evil. i can one hundred percent say that most people hate tj because he rivals jyrus.

and i can also one hundred percent say that tj has made cyrus happier than jonah beck every will, and that’s the real tea.

not to mention that i think having tj be more lgbt rep for the show would be much better than jonah. yes, while i would love to have a bi jonah beck, because bi representation is important, i think tj being lgbt would be more ground breaking.

tj would show kids that you can be masculine and still like the same gender. he would show kids that you can be comfortable with your sexuality and still be a jock. he would show kids that it’s okay to have a learning disability while also being lgbt, that it’s okay to be different in more than one way. i think that even if he isn’t lgbt he is still a good character. tj show kids that people you see as bullies may have deeper things going on, but it’s still not okay for them to take it out on others. he shows kids that it’s okay to have a learning disability. he shows kids that boys can be emotional and still masculine.

and having tryus be endgame would break SO many stereotypes. even the stereotype they resemble (jock x nerd, they also kind of have a romeo and juliet relationship) is completely different to anything i’ve seen. tj isn’t scared to be seen with cyrus, he has never made fun of cyrus so he could keep up his reputation. cyrus has never had to change himself for tj to like or notice him. cyrus hasn’t been hopelessly pining for tj - if anything i’d say it’s the opposite, tj is SMITTEN. tj doesn’t have to choose between basketball or cyrus, there’s no need to choose, because he doesn’t value basketball and his reputation over cyrus. they have never had to keep their friendship a secret because of their reputation. i’m pretty sure if anyone on the basketball team tried to get tj to stop being friends with cyrus because he’s nerdy or embarrassing, tj would go OFF.

overall, this ship is the healthiest, happiest, lgbt ship i’ve seen in a long time. wait, no, it’s the healthiest and happiest SHIP i’ve seen in a long time.﻿“
–Source


Hey! I found this on a Tyrus YouTube video and absolutely wanted to share it here. If the writer finds this and would like me to take it down, let me know! This was an absolute masterpiece by the way, you hit every point on the nose. God what a legend
body_abstract:
x -deceased- x  “[…] i used to ship jyrus, but only really because jonah was the only person to ship cyrus with at the time, you know? cyrus had a crush on jonah, jonah was really the only option for cyrus because he has little to no interactions with other boys on the show, and he verbally admitted to liking jonah.

but then, while on my laptop, i look over at my tv.. it’s the swing set scene, and i have never jumped ship faster. in that one little scene, i saw so much potential and chemistry between these two characters, more than i have ever seen between jonah and cyrus. as the show has gone on, i have seen how much more healthy and beneficial this relationship is than literally any other couple or ship on the show.

reblog.comment:
x -deceased- x  “[…] i used to ship jyrus, but only really because jonah was the only person to ship cyrus with at the time, you know? cyrus had a crush on jonah, jonah was really the only option for cyrus because he has little to no interactions with other boys on the show, and he verbally admitted to liking jonah.

but then, while on my laptop, i look over at my tv.. it’s the swing set scene, and i have never jumped ship faster. in that one little scene, i saw so much potential and chemistry between these two characters, more than i have ever seen between jonah and cyrus. as the show has gone on, i have seen how much more healthy and beneficial this relationship is than literally any other couple or ship on the show.


[[MORE]] i don’t understand how people can’t see how much these two help each other. tj makes cyrus comfortable, he doesn’t look down at him, and instead gets visibly upset when people belittle cyrus. cyrus also makes tj comfortable, he makes tj want to be a better person. these two accept each other for who they are, while still helping each other grow as people - and honestly, that’s what a good relationship should be.

jyrus is a fine ship and all, i can see the appeal. but i don’t think it would be a healthy relationship for cyrus. jonah beck thinks cyrus is helpless, jonah beck is embarrassed to do silly things with cyrus. jonah beck treats cyrus the same way he treats everyone else. on the other hand, tj kippen thinks cyrus can do whatever he puts his mind to. tj kippen isn’t afraid to be seen doing silly things with cyrus. tj kippen thinks the world of cyrus. tj treats no one else the way he treats cyrus. those soft looks?  reserved for cyrus. those big smiles? reserved for cyrus. the only time we have seen tj be himself are his scenes with cyrus.

tj obviously has a lot to make up for. he definitely needs to apologize to buffy, and from then on he just needs to be nicer to people. however, i notice so many people in the fandom act like he needs to do so much more to prove that he’s changed (mainly jyrus shippers..) and no, he really doesn’t. tj’s storyline with buffy is almost over. all he needs to do is apologize and his arc with her is finished. people are so against tyrus that they convince themselves that tj is worse than he actually is. since becoming friends with cyrus, tj has treated people with so much more respect and kindness, he’s shown that he has become a better person.  in every scene together. that’s right, every goddamn scene, tj and cyrus have helped each other grow as people. literally all tj needs to do is apologize to buffy. that’s it. he doesn’t have to save all of china for him to be completely redeemed.

the fandom has forgiven amber, i haven’t seen anyone say anything about everything she’s done. amber, while she has shown that she is becoming nicer, has still barely been redeemed at all. what she did was way worse than what tj did to buffy. he just picked on her a little to try and get her to quit the basketball team, while amber straight up emotionally manipulated jonah. but i still see people acting like amber is a saint while tj is the embodiment of all evil. i can one hundred percent say that most people hate tj because he rivals jyrus.

and i can also one hundred percent say that tj has made cyrus happier than jonah beck every will, and that’s the real tea.

not to mention that i think having tj be more lgbt rep for the show would be much better than jonah. yes, while i would love to have a bi jonah beck, because bi representation is important, i think tj being lgbt would be more ground breaking.

tj would show kids that you can be masculine and still like the same gender. he would show kids that you can be comfortable with your sexuality and still be a jock. he would show kids that it’s okay to have a learning disability while also being lgbt, that it’s okay to be different in more than one way. i think that even if he isn’t lgbt he is still a good character. tj show kids that people you see as bullies may have deeper things going on, but it’s still not okay for them to take it out on others. he shows kids that it’s okay to have a learning disability. he shows kids that boys can be emotional and still masculine.

and having tryus be endgame would break SO many stereotypes. even the stereotype they resemble (jock x nerd, they also kind of have a romeo and juliet relationship) is completely different to anything i’ve seen. tj isn’t scared to be seen with cyrus, he has never made fun of cyrus so he could keep up his reputation. cyrus has never had to change himself for tj to like or notice him. cyrus hasn’t been hopelessly pining for tj - if anything i’d say it’s the opposite, tj is SMITTEN. tj doesn’t have to choose between basketball or cyrus, there’s no need to choose, because he doesn’t value basketball and his reputation over cyrus. they have never had to keep their friendship a secret because of their reputation. i’m pretty sure if anyone on the basketball team tried to get tj to stop being friends with cyrus because he’s nerdy or embarrassing, tj would go OFF.

overall, this ship is the healthiest, happiest, lgbt ship i’ve seen in a long time. wait, no, it’s the healthiest and happiest SHIP i’ve seen in a long time.﻿“
–Source

trail.content_raw:
x -deceased- x  “[…] i used to ship jyrus, but only really because jonah was the only person to ship cyrus with at the time, you know? cyrus had a crush on jonah, jonah was really the only option for cyrus because he has little to no interactions with other boys on the show, and he verbally admitted to liking jonah.

but then, while on my laptop, i look over at my tv.. it’s the swing set scene, and i have never jumped ship faster. in that one little scene, i saw so much potential and chemistry between these two characters, more than i have ever seen between jonah and cyrus. as the show has gone on, i have seen how much more healthy and beneficial this relationship is than literally any other couple or ship on the show.


[[MORE]] i don’t understand how people can’t see how much these two help each other. tj makes cyrus comfortable, he doesn’t look down at him, and instead gets visibly upset when people belittle cyrus. cyrus also makes tj comfortable, he makes tj want to be a better person. these two accept each other for who they are, while still helping each other grow as people - and honestly, that’s what a good relationship should be.

jyrus is a fine ship and all, i can see the appeal. but i don’t think it would be a healthy relationship for cyrus. jonah beck thinks cyrus is helpless, jonah beck is embarrassed to do silly things with cyrus. jonah beck treats cyrus the same way he treats everyone else. on the other hand, tj kippen thinks cyrus can do whatever he puts his mind to. tj kippen isn’t afraid to be seen doing silly things with cyrus. tj kippen thinks the world of cyrus. tj treats no one else the way he treats cyrus. those soft looks?  reserved for cyrus. those big smiles? reserved for cyrus. the only time we have seen tj be himself are his scenes with cyrus.

tj obviously has a lot to make up for. he definitely needs to apologize to buffy, and from then on he just needs to be nicer to people. however, i notice so many people in the fandom act like he needs to do so much more to prove that he’s changed (mainly jyrus shippers..) and no, he really doesn’t. tj’s storyline with buffy is almost over. all he needs to do is apologize and his arc with her is finished. people are so against tyrus that they convince themselves that tj is worse than he actually is. since becoming friends with cyrus, tj has treated people with so much more respect and kindness, he’s shown that he has become a better person.  in every scene together. that’s right, every goddamn scene, tj and cyrus have helped each other grow as people. literally all tj needs to do is apologize to buffy. that’s it. he doesn’t have to save all of china for him to be completely redeemed.

the fandom has forgiven amber, i haven’t seen anyone say anything about everything she’s done. amber, while she has shown that she is becoming nicer, has still barely been redeemed at all. what she did was way worse than what tj did to buffy. he just picked on her a little to try and get her to quit the basketball team, while amber straight up emotionally manipulated jonah. but i still see people acting like amber is a saint while tj is the embodiment of all evil. i can one hundred percent say that most people hate tj because he rivals jyrus.

and i can also one hundred percent say that tj has made cyrus happier than jonah beck every will, and that’s the real tea.

not to mention that i think having tj be more lgbt rep for the show would be much better than jonah. yes, while i would love to have a bi jonah beck, because bi representation is important, i think tj being lgbt would be more ground breaking.

tj would show kids that you can be masculine and still like the same gender. he would show kids that you can be comfortable with your sexuality and still be a jock. he would show kids that it’s okay to have a learning disability while also being lgbt, that it’s okay to be different in more than one way. i think that even if he isn’t lgbt he is still a good character. tj show kids that people you see as bullies may have deeper things going on, but it’s still not okay for them to take it out on others. he shows kids that it’s okay to have a learning disability. he shows kids that boys can be emotional and still masculine.

and having tryus be endgame would break SO many stereotypes. even the stereotype they resemble (jock x nerd, they also kind of have a romeo and juliet relationship) is completely different to anything i’ve seen. tj isn’t scared to be seen with cyrus, he has never made fun of cyrus so he could keep up his reputation. cyrus has never had to change himself for tj to like or notice him. cyrus hasn’t been hopelessly pining for tj - if anything i’d say it’s the opposite, tj is SMITTEN. tj doesn’t have to choose between basketball or cyrus, there’s no need to choose, because he doesn’t value basketball and his reputation over cyrus. they have never had to keep their friendship a secret because of their reputation. i’m pretty sure if anyone on the basketball team tried to get tj to stop being friends with cyrus because he’s nerdy or embarrassing, tj would go OFF.

overall, this ship is the healthiest, happiest, lgbt ship i’ve seen in a long time. wait, no, it’s the healthiest and happiest SHIP i’ve seen in a long time.﻿“
–Source

summary: jyrus month day 3 - high school/college
body:
jyrus month day 3 - high school/college

this is just a hc because i suck at writing but if anyone wants to fic it please do 😂

jonah and cyrus lost touch after high school, jonah still not knowing cyrus had a crush on him. they both came out (unbeknownst to eachother) during college, cyrus as gay and jonah as bi. they reconnect one night when they’re set up on a blind date, the people setting them up oblivious to their emotionally heavy past.

summary:
Family Over Everything
-  "The guy who couldn't get a muffin, really?" TJ shook his head.
"Aw, I think it's sweet!" Amber...
body:
Family Over Everything

- “The guy who couldn’t get a muffin, really?” TJ shook his head.

“Aw, I think it’s sweet!” Amber sighed. “Young love.”

“Please stop.” Jonah groaned, hitting his head head against the table.

Family Over Everything is a fic, coming soon to Archive of Our Own, about Amber, TJ, and Jonah and how they’ve dealt with being in the foster care system. [Written by @an-anxious-gay-mess, @jyrusreignson, @he-lives-on-mirkwood, @cyrushack, @youre-no-different, @heavenlybyers, @cyrusgoodman, @cyrus-gayman, and @you-get-to-exhale-now-cyrus ]

summary: the date is exactly a year from today, Andi Mack is done with their third season Marty came back from the party Tyrus finally...
body:
the date is exactly a year from today, Andi Mack is done with their third season

  • Marty came back from the party
  • Tyrus finally became canon
  • Bex and Bowie are now a happily married couple
  • Jonah received help from a therapist for his panic attacks/ anxiety
  • Amber got the full redemption arc she deserved
  • Bex and Cece successfully opened Cloud 10

because of all the great content in season 3 views skyrocketed and it was revealed that the show was renewed for a fourth season

so you sit on your couch and watch the finale for the hundredth time because life is good and just like you, Andi Mack is still thriving

summary: 30 Days of Jyrus, Day 3
title: 30 Days of Jyrus, Day 3
body:
Title: Sweep Me Off My Feet

Summary: Cyrus is late for class. College AU/meet-cute. Pure fluff. 

The meadow was bustling with students, some heading to classes, some heading to small café just off the meadow, and others still heading home for the day. Cyrus was among those heading to class—actually, he was running late. He’d stopped for a coffee in the aforementioned café, which he usually timed perfectly, but that day they just happened to be training a new barista, which meant it took nearly twice as long for him to get his coffee. He didn’t blame the baristas, and he still shoved a few crumpled dollars into their tip jar, but it was still an unfortunate situation.

He weaved his way across the meadow, avoiding the folks who sat on the meadow to do homework or eat lunch, and the obnoxious frat boys who were always throwing some kind of ball around, whether it was a football, a basketball, a baseball, or even a volleyball. “Heads!” One of them called, and Cyrus rolled his eyes, but ducked nonetheless as a football sailed overhead.

“Watch it!” Cyrus yelled in the vague direction of the frat boy who’d thrown it. It wasn’t that Cyrus hated frat boys entirely—they were just people with different interests, after all—but they frequently found ways to annoy him. Or make him late for class. Or both. So, he generally didn’t give them the time of day.

Cyrus had almost made it through the mine field that was the meadow, when a voice called out from behind him: “Look out!” Cyrus turned, expecting the voice came from yet another frat guy, but instead he came face to face with a confusingly flat projectile, and the next thing he knew he was flat on his back, dew from the grass seeping into his clothes, his forehead throbbing with pain.

“Oh my God, are you okay?” The voice was closer now.  

Cyrus groaned, but didn’t move or speak.

Soon, the stranger to whom the voice belonged was kneeling next to Cyrus, who could only really see his dark blue jeans. “I’m so sorry.”

“You should be,” Cyrus snapped, still not moving. “Do you frat boys ever watch where you throw things?”

“I’m not in a fraternity. I play Ultimate Frisbee,” the stranger said, extending a hand. So that was what hit him. A frisbee. “But I’m really am sorry, let me help you up.”  

Cyrus took the boy’s hand, sat up to finally get a look at the apparently-not-a-frat-boy who’d nearly knocked him out, and promptly fell over again. The stranger was stupidly cute, all big, green eyes and dimples and bangs falling in his face.

“Woah, you okay?”

Cyrus pulled himself back up. “Uh, yeah. But you owe me five bucks for that coffee.” Cyrus gestured to the empty cup next to him in the grass.

“Hmm,” the boy smirked, “How about I just buy you another one?”

Cyrus fought a blush. “I, uh, I’d like that.” There was a long pause, neither one sure what to say, until eventually Cyrus remembered himself. “My name’s Cyrus, by the way.” 

“Nice to meet you, Cyrus,” the boy’s smirk softened into a genuine smile. “I’m Jonah.”
